Reviews.Title: Good value, okay quality, horrible support
Reviews.Author: Amazon Consumer

ProductInfo.Features:
# Stream live digital video directly to your supported 3G Smart Phone, including iPhone, iPad, and AndroidTM (see below for more support details)
# Easily monitor and manage your DVR from anywhere in the world over the Internet from a PC
# Pentaplex operation: Record, watch live or playback video, monitor and manage remotely, and backup files
# Easy video search by  1) Time  2) Motion Detection Event  3) Alarm Triggered Event
# Playback and view up to 8 cameras at the same time
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See 8-channel Surveillence System 8 CCD Cameras w/ 40 Ft. Night Vision H.264 DVR w/ 500GB HDD Remotely Monitor via PC and 3G Smartphone QS408 + QSDS14273X8
